entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmBuildTests are failing in CI #81302
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to retrieve the ".override" declaration with the reflection APIs #81299
  • DebuggerTests.MiscTests.CannotDebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithoutPdb test timed out on CI #81294
  • Binary DataContract Serialization raises exception with certain contents. #81290
  • Linux runtime only uses 1 core of those available when running with forced scheduler affinity #81289
  • [API Proposal]: Rethink and implement use case of CS0416 #81287
  • Address NativeAOT header file strategy to allow windows global definitions to co-exist #81285
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Support debugging multi-threaded apps #81282
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #81280
  • STJ should support deserializing/serializing nested polymorphism #81279
  • Generalize Arm64 ldr/str to ldp/stp optimization #81278
    8.0.0
  • Error 1067 during windows service stop #81274
  • [API Proposal]: JsonConverter to deserialize Dictionary<string,object> as values objects not JsonElements #81270
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.TryGetTypeInfo #81269
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix calling JS functions from workers #81268
    8.0.0
  • Consider improving the source formatter in the STJ source generator #81260
    8.0.0
  • Don't use System.Linq.Expressions in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory with AOT #81258
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationToken.OnReset event #81255
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests segfault in monoeg_g_hash_table_insert_replace #81249

Closed

  • ConfigurationBinder.Get<T> ignores value types .ctor #81298
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision based on ref counts and liveness interact in incorrect ways #81019
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Abstract System.Reflection.Emit public types #78542
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Count / number of occurrences of a value in a span #59466
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Low level API support for Objective-C scenarios #77472
    8.0.0
  • Improve efficiency of parsing of Transfer-Encoding: chunked on HTTP/1.1 response #63052
    8.0.0
  • Lacking performance of `StringBuilder.Replace` #80952
  • Do not use OfType<T>() with impossible types #33770
    8.0.0
  • NegotiateStream Wireshark decoder #80818
    8.0.0
  • Skipping System.Threading.Tasks test suite for mono interpreter #35916
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type cannot delegate derived type declaration to sub-classes #81236
  • [mono] Assertion at sgen-stw.c:77, condition not met #76805
    8.0.0
  • Exception not being thrown when null value encountered for non-nullable type #81007
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77551
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77552
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<Int32> #79292
    8.0.0
  • JSON source generator emits CS0612 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #76829
    8.0.0
  • Exception when Deserializing Nullable<double> #81025
  • FindPythonWindows does not error gracefully #59724
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Clean up StackTrace/StackFrame icalls. #81303
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fixing a comment attached to DEFAULT_UNROLL_LOOP_MAX_ITERATION_COUNT #81300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sprinkle some more readonly around #81297
    area-Meta
  • Re-enable OneLocBuild #81296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid passing the icall name/c function name to mono_reg… #81293
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.x
  • JIT: build pred lists before instrumentation #81288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable function pointer test for crossgen due to an existing issue #81286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    area-System.Resources
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    area-System.Resources
  • [mono][jit] Improve handling of the ldtoken+ltoken+Type::op_Equal opt… #81277
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix calling JS functions from workers #81273
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add reflection path for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #81262
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix ReaderWriterLock when using it in recursive scenarios and multiple instances on the same thread #81257
    area-System.Threading
  • Change Nullability annotation on `ISelectionService.PrimarySelection` #81254
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Using `cmovns` for faster division #81252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81250
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix x86 clrgc loading #81176
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce the size of HttpRequestMessage and HttpRequestHeaders #81251
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Pin the sdk version to avoid a regression #81301
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testing CI #81259
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] conditional revert of wasm imports optimization #81275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure we specify arguments only when the test ask for it #80947
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Force partial trim mode for browser bench #81284
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: update `fgReplaceJumpTarget` to maintain pred lists #81246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid allocations in 'Transfer-Encoding: Chunked' check #81253
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #80996
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono] Re-enable System.Threading.Tasks tests for desktop interp #81046
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: consolidate inlining code in fgInline.cpp #81198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix type pushed by mkrefanytype #81261
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Skip failing System.Diagnostics.Process tests #81231
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add additional bool-only ToFrozenDictionary/Set overloads #81256
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Make a number of improvements to the System.Text.Json source generator #81239
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add @kotlarmilos as code owner #81209
    area-Meta
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable eventsourceerror test for Windows ARM32 #81244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - X64 - Peephole optimization to possibly skip emitting `and reg, -1` #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve -static-pie support #81163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve error for missing Python #81202
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix nullability on `IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer` #81203
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `printf` implementation #81243
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix special sweep issue for workstation #81248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate a bounds check in `NumberBuffer` #81039
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix SslStream IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Android API 21-27 #81224
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools as for the rest of repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] arm64 neon opcodes #81026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Loop alignment support for xarch #81206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
